structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - PARADES, DEMONSTRATIONS AND STREET EVENTS
Sec. 12-1053. - STANDARDS FOR CONDUCT OF PARADES.

text.section: No parade or part thereof may be conducted on the streets of the City between the hours of 7:00 a.m. to 9:00 a.m. and 4:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m.
No more than one parade may be conducted within the City at any one time.

Every parade shall follow a route approved by the City Manager. The City Manager shall approve no route which is incompatible with the preservation of public health, safety and welfare. The City Manager's disapproval of a proposed route may be appealed to the City Council.
No one participating in a parade or proceeding along the route of a parade shall distribute therefrom any candy, cigarettes, prizes or favors of any kind.
No vicious animal whether leashed or unleashed shall participate in or proceed along the route of a parade. (Code 1959 , ยง21-31(e); Ord. No. 1980-346, ยง2, 4-1-80; Ord. No. 1989-304, ยง1, 2-7-89)
